alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Lamoille; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 7:18PM EDT until July 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lamoille County in northwestern Vermont... Northern Caledonia County in northeastern Vermont... Central Orleans County in northeastern Vermont... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 716 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elmore, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Orleans, Greensboro, West Burke Village, Irasburg, Westmore, Stannard, Orleans Village, Wheelock, Glover, Brownington, Albany, Willoughby, Wolcott, Sutton, Coventry, Barton, Greensboro Bend, Barton Village, Albany Village, and Sheffield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
